ygData.subject: FW: [shadowknight] Re: Quiet...
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you CERTAIn this is true? I have made it a point to Steal Strength anytime I am hit for more then 5points. The frequency certainly seems to decrease the
ygData.messageBody:
Are you CERTAIn this is true? I have made it a point to Steal Strength
anytime I am hit for more then 5points. The frequency certainly seems to
decrease the more times I do it. Has anyone else noticed this/ tried this?

Sthiel
Cazic Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: ken [mailto:brooksc@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 6:39 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Quiet...


From: "ken" <brooksc@...>

Its a one time thing so casting it more than once is just a waste of a
weapon swing.


Trian Soulstealer
Cazic Thule

>
>as far as SK's being underpowered....I just hit 9th level and am now
>starting to cruise. Our spells aren't the best....but they are fun. Not
>having to run to every critter i want to engage....being able to suck
>str...and find my body::shuder:: if i die.
>
>One question though that has been floating around. A friend of mine asked
>if Siphon Strength works multiple times on one critter. I know you only
>get the initial Str from the target...but if you keep casting does their
>Str keep going down even if we are not taking it?
>
>Korm
>Cazic Thule
>
